raw_body: ANANDAPPA – HILARY. Loving husband of Chulanie, much loved father of Sashika and Vishwa Weerawardana, beloved son of Bede and late Queenie Anandappa, son-in-law of late Oswin and Lily Wijeratne, brother of Max, Frank, Carmel Canagasabey, Trevor, late Christine, Gladwyn, Pam Appathurai and Glossinda Solomonsz called to rest with the Lord.
